AddTimeWindow.document: This API (AddTimeWindow) is used to add a maintenance time window for a TencentDB instance, so as to specify when the instance can automatically perform access switch operations.
AddTimeWindow.name: Adds a maintenance time window

AdjustCdbProxy.document: This API is used to adjust the configuration of database proxy.
AdjustCdbProxy.name: Adjusts the configuration of database proxy

AdjustCdbProxyAddress.document: This API is used to adjust the database proxy address.
AdjustCdbProxyAddress.name: Adjusts database proxy address

AnalyzeAuditLogs.document: This API is used to aggregate the audit logs filtered by different conditions and aggregate the statistics of the specified data rows.
AnalyzeAuditLogs.name: Analyzes audit log

AssociateSecurityGroups.document: This API (AssociateSecurityGroups) is used to bind security groups to instances in batches.
AssociateSecurityGroups.name: Binds security groups in batches

BalanceRoGroupLoad.document: This API is used to rebalance the loads of instances in an RO group. Please note that the database connections to those instances will be interrupted transiently; therefore, you should ensure that your application can reconnect to the databases. This operation should be performed with caution.
BalanceRoGroupLoad.name: Rebalances the loads of instances in RO group

CloseCDBProxy.document: This API is used to disable database proxy.
CloseCDBProxy.name: Disables database proxy

CloseCdbProxyAddress.document: This API is used to disable the database proxy address.
CloseCdbProxyAddress.name: Disables database proxy address

CloseWanService.document: This API (CloseWanService) is used to disable public network access for TencentDB instance, which will make public IP addresses inaccessible.
CloseWanService.name: Disables public network access for an instance

CreateAccounts.document: This API is used to create a TencentDB account. The account name, host address, and password are required. Account remarks and maximum connections can also be configured.
CreateAccounts.name: Creates a TencentDB account

CreateAuditPolicy.document: This API is used to create an audit policy for a TencentDB instance by associating an audit rule with the TencentDB instance.
CreateAuditPolicy.name: Creates an audit policy

CreateBackup.document: This API (CreateBackup) is used to create a TencentDB instance backup.
CreateBackup.name: Creates a TencentDB instance backup

CreateCdbProxy.document: This API is used create a database proxy for a source instance.
CreateCdbProxy.name: Creates a database proxy

CreateCdbProxyAddress.document: This API is used to create a database proxy address.
CreateCdbProxyAddress.name: Creates a database proxy address

CreateCloneInstance.document: This API is used to create a clone of a specific instance, and roll back the clone by using a physical backup file of the instance or roll back the clone to a point in time.
CreateCloneInstance.name: Clones an instance

CreateDBImportJob.document:
This API (CreateDBImportJob) is used to create a data import task for a TencentDB instance.

Note that the files for a data import task must be uploaded to Tencent Cloud in advance. You need to do so in the console.
CreateDBImportJob.name: Creates a data import task

CreateDBInstance.document:
This API is used to create a monthly subscribed TencentDB instance (which can be a source, disaster recovery, or read-only instance) by passing in information such as instance specifications, MySQL version number, purchased duration, and quantity.

This is an asynchronous API. You can also use the [DescribeDBInstances](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/236/15872?from_cn_redirect=1) API to query the instance details. If the output parameter `Status` is `1` and the output parameter `TaskStatus` is `0`, the instance has been successfully delivered.

1. You can use the [DescribeDBZoneConfig](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/236/17229?from_cn_redirect=1) API to query the purchasable instance specifications, and then use the [DescribeDBPrice](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/236/18566?from_cn_redirect=1) API to query the prices of the purchasable instances.
2. You can create up to 100 instances at a time, with an instance validity period of up to 36 months.
3. MySQL v5.5, v5.6, v5.7, and v8.0 are supported.
4. Source instances, read-only instances, and disaster recovery instances can be created.
5. If `Port`, `ParamList`, or `Password` is specified in the input parameters, the instance (excluding basic instances) will be initialized.
6. If `Port`, `ParamTemplateId`, or `AlarmPolicyList` is specified in the input parameters, you need to update your SDK to the latest version.
CreateDBInstance.name: Creates a monthly subscribed TencentDB instance

CreateDBInstanceHour.document:
This API is used to create a pay-as-you-go TencentDB instance (which can be a source, disaster recovery, or read-only instance) by passing in information such as instance specifications, MySQL version number, and quantity.

This is an async API. You can also use the [DescribeDBInstances](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/236/15872?from_cn_redirect=1) API to query the instance details. If the `Status` value of an instance is `1` and `TaskStatus` is `0`, the instance has been successfully delivered.

1. You can use the [DescribeDBZoneConfig](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/236/17229?from_cn_redirect=1) API to query the purchasable instance specifications, and then use the [DescribeDBPrice](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/236/18566?from_cn_redirect=1) API to query the prices of the purchasable instances.
2. You can create up to 100 instances at a time, with an instance validity period of up to 36 months.
3. MySQL 5.5, 5.6, 5.7, and 8.0 are supported.
4. Source instances, disaster recovery instances, and read-only instances can be created.
5. If `Port`, `ParamList`, or `Password` is specified in the input parameters, the instance will be initialized.
CreateDBInstanceHour.name: Creates pay-as-you-go TencentDB instance

CreateDatabase.document: This API is used to create a database in a TencentDB instance.
CreateDatabase.name: Creates a database

CreateParamTemplate.document: This API is used to create a parameter template. The common request parameter `Region` can only be set to `ap-guangzhou`.
CreateParamTemplate.name: Creates a parameter template

CreateRoInstanceIp.document: This API is used to create a VIP exclusive to a TencentDB read-only instance.
CreateRoInstanceIp.name: Creates a VIP exclusive to a TencentDB read-only instance

DeleteAccounts.document: This API (DeleteAccounts) is used to delete TencentDB accounts.
DeleteAccounts.name: Deletes TencentDB accounts

DeleteBackup.document: This API is used to delete a database backup. It can only delete manually initiated backups.
DeleteBackup.name: Deletes a TencentDB instance backup

DeleteParamTemplate.document: This API is used to delete a parameter template. The common request parameter `Region` can only be set to `ap-guangzhou`.
DeleteParamTemplate.name: Deletes a parameter template

DeleteTimeWindow.document: This API (DeleteTimeWindow) is used to delete a maintenance time window for a TencentDB instance. After it is deleted, the default maintenance time window will be 03:00-04:00, i.e., switch to a new instance will be performed during 03:00-04:00 by default.
DeleteTimeWindow.name: Deletes a maintenance time window

DescribeAccountPrivileges.document: This API (DescribeAccountPrivileges) is used to query the information of TencentDB account permissions.
DescribeAccountPrivileges.name: Queries the information of TencentDB account permissions

DescribeAccounts.document: This API is used to query information of all TencentDB accounts.
DescribeAccounts.name: Queries the information of all TencentDB accounts

DescribeAsyncRequestInfo.document: This API (DescribeAsyncRequestInfo) is used to query the async task execution result of a TencentDB instance.
DescribeAsyncRequestInfo.name: Queries the execution result of an async task

DescribeAuditLogs.document: This API is used to query a database audit log.
DescribeAuditLogs.name: Queries a database audit log

DescribeAuditPolicies.document: This API is used to query the audit policies of a TencentDB instance.
DescribeAuditPolicies.name: Queries the audit policies

DescribeAuditRules.document: This API is used to query the audit rules in the current region.
DescribeAuditRules.name: Queries the audit rules

DescribeBackupConfig.document: This API (DescribeBackupConfig) is used to query the configuration information of a TencentDB instance backup.
DescribeBackupConfig.name: Queries the configuration information of a TencentDB instance backup

DescribeBackupDecryptionKey.document: This API is used to query the decryption key of a backup file.
DescribeBackupDecryptionKey.name: Queries the decryption key of a backup file

DescribeBackupDownloadRestriction.document: This API is used to query the restrictions of downloading backups in a region.
DescribeBackupDownloadRestriction.name: Queries backup download restrictions

DescribeBackupEncryptionStatus.document: This API is used to query the default encryption status of an instance backup.
DescribeBackupEncryptionStatus.name: Queries the default encryption status of an instance backup

DescribeBackupOverview.document: This API is used to query the backup overview of a user. It will return the user's current total number of backups, total capacity used by backups, capacity in the free tier, and paid capacity (all capacity values are in bytes).
DescribeBackupOverview.name: Queries backup overview

DescribeBackupSummaries.document: This API is used to query the statistics of backups. It will return the capacity used by backups at the instance level and the number and used capacity of data backups and log backups of each instance (all capacity values are in bytes).
DescribeBackupSummaries.name: Queries real-time backup statistics

DescribeBackups.document: This API (DescribeBackups) is used to query the backups of a TencentDB instance.
DescribeBackups.name: Queries data backup file list

DescribeBinlogBackupOverview.document: This API is used to query the log backup overview of a user in the current region.
DescribeBinlogBackupOverview.name: Queries log backup overview

DescribeBinlogs.document: This API is used to query the list of binlog files of a TencentDB instance.
DescribeBinlogs.name: Queries binlog backup file list

DescribeCdbProxyInfo.document: This API is used to query the details of a database proxy.
DescribeCdbProxyInfo.name: Queries the details of a database proxy

DescribeCdbZoneConfig.document: This API is used to query the purchasable specifications of TencentDB instances in a region.
DescribeCdbZoneConfig.name: Queries the AZ and the purchasable specifications of the database.

DescribeCloneList.document: This API is used to query the clone task list of an instance.
DescribeCloneList.name: Queries the clone task list

DescribeDBFeatures.document: This API is used to query database version attributes, including supported features such as database encryption and audit.
DescribeDBFeatures.name: Queries the version attributes of an instance

DescribeDBImportRecords.document: This API (DescribeDBImportRecords) is used to query the records of import tasks in a TencentDB instance.
DescribeDBImportRecords.name: Queries import task records

DescribeDBInstanceCharset.document: This API (DescribeDBInstanceCharset) is used to query the character set and its name of a TencentDB instance.
DescribeDBInstanceCharset.name: Queries the character set of a TencentDB instance

DescribeDBInstanceConfig.document: This API (DescribeDBInstanceConfig) is used to query the configuration information of a TencentDB instance, such as its synchronization mode and deployment mode.
DescribeDBInstanceConfig.name: Queries the configuration information of a TencentDB instance

DescribeDBInstanceGTID.document: This API (DescribeDBInstanceGTID) is used to query whether GTID is activated for a TencentDB instance. Instances on or below version 5.5 are not supported.
DescribeDBInstanceGTID.name: Queries whether GTID is activated for a TencentDB instance

DescribeDBInstanceInfo.document: This API is used to query the basic information of an instance (instance ID, instance name, and whether encryption is enabled).
DescribeDBInstanceInfo.name: Queries the basic information of instance

DescribeDBInstanceRebootTime.document: This API (DescribeDBInstanceRebootTime) is used to query the estimated time needed for a TencentDB instance to restart.
DescribeDBInstanceRebootTime.name: Queries the estimated restart time of a TencentDB instance

DescribeDBInstances.document: This API (DescribeDBInstances) is used to query the list of TencentDB instances (which can be primary, disaster recovery, or read-only instances). It supports filtering instances by project ID, instance ID, access address, and instance status.
DescribeDBInstances.name: Queries the list of instances

DescribeDBPrice.document: This API is used to query the purchase or renewal price of a pay-as-you-go or monthly subscribed TencentDB instance by passing in information such as instance type, purchase duration, number of instances to purchase, memory size, disk size, and AZ. For the price of instance renewal, you can pass in instance name to query. Note: To query prices in a specific region, you need to use the access point of the region. For more information on access points, see Service Address. For example, to query prices in Guangzhou, send a request to: cdb.ap-guangzhou.tencentcloudapi.com. Likewise, to query prices in Shanghai, send a request to: cdb.ap-shanghai.tencentcloudapi.com.
DescribeDBPrice.name: Queries the prices of TencentDB instances

DescribeDBSecurityGroups.document: This API (DescribeDBSecurityGroups) is used to query the security group details of an instance.
DescribeDBSecurityGroups.name: Queries the security group information

DescribeDBSwitchRecords.document: This API (DescribeDBSwitchRecords) is used to query the instance switch records.
DescribeDBSwitchRecords.name: Queries the instance switch records

DescribeDataBackupOverview.document: This API is used to query the data backup overview of a user in the current region.
DescribeDataBackupOverview.name: Queries data backup overview

DescribeDatabases.document: This API is used to query the information of databases in a TencentDB instance which must be a source or disaster recovery instance.
DescribeDatabases.name: Queries databases

DescribeDefaultParams.document: This API (DescribeDefaultParams) is used to query the list of default configurable parameters.
DescribeDefaultParams.name: Queries the list of default configurable parameters

DescribeDeviceMonitorInfo.document: This API (DescribeDeviceMonitorInfo) is used to query the monitoring information of a TencentDB physical machine on the day. Currently, it only supports instances with 488 GB memory and 6 TB disk.
DescribeDeviceMonitorInfo.name: Queries the monitoring information of a physical machine

DescribeErrorLogData.document:
This API is used to query the error logs of an instance over the past month by search criteria.
Note: the HTTP response packet will be very large if it contain a single large error log, which causes the API call to time out. If this happens, we recommend you lower the value of the input parameter `Limit` to reduce the packet size so that the API can respond timely.
DescribeErrorLogData.name: Queries instance error log details

DescribeInstanceParamRecords.document: This API (DescribeInstanceParamRecords) is used to query the parameter modification records of an instance.
DescribeInstanceParamRecords.name: Queries the parameter modification records

DescribeInstanceParams.document: This API (DescribeInstanceParams) is used to query the list of parameters for an instance.
DescribeInstanceParams.name: Queries the list of configurable parameters for an instance

DescribeLocalBinlogConfig.document: This API is used to query the retention policy of local binlog of an instance.
DescribeLocalBinlogConfig.name: Queries the retention policy of local binlog

DescribeParamTemplateInfo.document: This API is used to query parameter template details. The common request parameter `Region` can only be set to `ap-guangzhou`.
DescribeParamTemplateInfo.name: Queries the parameter template details

DescribeParamTemplates.document: This API is used to query the parameter template list. The common request parameter `Region` can only be set to `ap-guangzhou`.
DescribeParamTemplates.name: Queries the list of parameter templates

DescribeProjectSecurityGroups.document: This API (DescribeProjectSecurityGroups) is used to query the security group details of a project.
DescribeProjectSecurityGroups.name: Queries the security group information of a project

DescribeProxyCustomConf.document: This API is used to query the proxy configuration.
DescribeProxyCustomConf.name: Queries the proxy configuration

DescribeProxySupportParam.document: This API is used to query the supported proxy versions and parameters for an instance.
DescribeProxySupportParam.name: Queries the supported proxy versions and parameters for an instance

DescribeRemoteBackupConfig.document: This API is used to query the configuration information of a remote TencentDB instance backup.
DescribeRemoteBackupConfig.name: Queries the configuration information of a remote TencentDB instance backup

DescribeRoGroups.document: This API is used to query the information of all RO groups of a TencentDB instance.
DescribeRoGroups.name: Queries the information of all RO groups of TencentDB instance

DescribeRoMinScale.document: This API is used to query the minimum specification of a read-only instance that can be purchased or upgraded to.
DescribeRoMinScale.name: Queries the minimum specification of a read-only instance that can be purchased or upgraded to

DescribeRollbackRangeTime.document: This API (DescribeRollbackRangeTime) is used to query the time range available for instance rollback.
DescribeRollbackRangeTime.name: Queries the time range available for rollback

DescribeRollbackTaskDetail.document: This API is used to query the details of a TencentDB instance rollback task.
DescribeRollbackTaskDetail.name: Queries rollback task details

DescribeSlowLogData.document:
This API is used to query the slow logs of an instance over the past month by search criteria.
Note: the HTTP response packet will be very large if it contain a single large slow log, which causes the API call to time out. If this happens, we recommend you lower the value of the input parameter `Limit` to reduce the packet size so that the API can respond timely.
DescribeSlowLogData.name: Queries instance slow logs

DescribeSlowLogs.document: This API (DescribeSlowLogs) is used to query the slow logs of a TencentDB instance.
DescribeSlowLogs.name: Queries slow logs

DescribeSupportedPrivileges.document: This API (DescribeSupportedPrivileges) is used to query the information of TencentDB account permissions, including global permissions, database permissions, table permissions, and column permissions.
DescribeSupportedPrivileges.name: Queries the information of TencentDB instance permissions

DescribeTables.document: This API is used to query the information of database tables in a TencentDB instance. It only supports source or disaster recovery instances.
DescribeTables.name: Queries database tables

DescribeTagsOfInstanceIds.document: This API (DescribeTagsOfInstanceIds) is used to query the tag information of a TencentDB instance.
DescribeTagsOfInstanceIds.name: Queries instance tags

DescribeTasks.document: This API (DescribeTasks) is used to query the list of tasks for a TencentDB instance.
DescribeTasks.name: Queries the list of tasks for a TencentDB instance

DescribeTimeWindow.document: This API (DescribeTimeWindow) is used to query the maintenance time window of a TencentDB instance.
DescribeTimeWindow.name: Queries a maintenance time window

DescribeUploadedFiles.document: This API is used to query the list of SQL files imported by users. The common request parameter `Region` must be `ap-shanghai`.
DescribeUploadedFiles.name: Queries the list of imported SQL files (deprecated)

DisassociateSecurityGroups.document: This API (DisassociateSecurityGroups) is used to unbind security groups from instances in batches.
DisassociateSecurityGroups.name: Unbinds security groups in batches

InitDBInstances.document:
该接口不再维护，参考CreateDBInstance+API文档，在发货时即可完成初始化。

This API was disused. You can refer to the CreateDBInstance API, and initialize the instance when creating it.

This API is used to initialize a TencentDB instance, including initial password, default character set, and instance port number. But it is disused and not recommended. You can now set the instance information by using the parameter `Password`, `ParamList`, and `Port` respectively in the `CreateDBInstance` and `CreateDBInstanceHour` APIs.
InitDBInstances.name: Initializes a new instance

IsolateDBInstance.document: This API is used to isolate a TencentDB instance, which will no longer be accessible via IP and port. The isolated instance can be started up in the recycle bin. If it is isolated due to arrears, please top up your account as soon as possible.
IsolateDBInstance.name: Isolates a TencentDB instance

ModifyAccountDescription.document: This API (ModifyAccountDescription) is used to modify the remarks of a TencentDB instance account.
ModifyAccountDescription.name: Modifies the remarks of a TencentDB instance account

ModifyAccountMaxUserConnections.document: This API is used to modify the maximum connections of one or more TencentDB instance accounts.
ModifyAccountMaxUserConnections.name: Modifies the maximum connections of one or more TencentDB instance accounts

ModifyAccountPassword.document: This API (ModifyAccountPassword) is used to modify the password of a TencentDB instance account.
ModifyAccountPassword.name: Modifies the password of a TencentDB instance account

ModifyAccountPrivileges.name: Modifies the permissions of a TencentDB instance account

ModifyAutoRenewFlag.document: This API is used to modify the auto-renewal flag of a TencentDB instance.
ModifyAutoRenewFlag.name: Modifies the auto-renewal flag of a TencentDB instance

ModifyBackupConfig.document: This API (ModifyBackupConfig) is used to modify the database backup configuration.
ModifyBackupConfig.name: Modifies the database backup configuration

ModifyBackupDownloadRestriction.document: This API is used to modify the restrictions of downloading backups in a region. You can specify which types of networks (private, or both private and public), VPCs, and IPs to download backups.
ModifyBackupDownloadRestriction.name: Modifies backup download restrictions

ModifyBackupEncryptionStatus.document: This API is used to set the encryption status of an instance backup.
ModifyBackupEncryptionStatus.name: Sets the default encryption status of an instance backup

ModifyCdbProxyAddressDesc.document: This API is used to modify the description of a proxy address.
ModifyCdbProxyAddressDesc.name: Modifies the description of a proxy address

ModifyCdbProxyAddressVipAndVPort.document: This API is used to modify the VPC of the database proxy address.
ModifyCdbProxyAddressVipAndVPort.name: Modifies the VPC of the database proxy address

ModifyCdbProxyParam.document: This API is used to configure the database proxy parameters.
ModifyCdbProxyParam.name: Configures the database proxy parameters

ModifyDBInstanceName.document: This API (ModifyDBInstanceName) is used to rename a TencentDB instance.
ModifyDBInstanceName.name: Renames a TencentDB instance

ModifyDBInstanceProject.document: This API (ModifyDBInstanceProject) is used to modify the project to which a TencentDB instance belongs.
ModifyDBInstanceProject.name: Modifies the project to which a TencentDB instance belongs

ModifyDBInstanceSecurityGroups.document: This API (ModifyDBInstanceSecurityGroups) is used to modify the security groups bound to a TencentDB instance.
ModifyDBInstanceSecurityGroups.name: Modifies the security groups bound to a TencentDB instance

ModifyDBInstanceVipVport.document: This API is used to modify the IP and port number of a TencentDB instance, switch from classic network to VPC, or change VPC subnets.
ModifyDBInstanceVipVport.name: Modifies the IP and port number of a TencentDB instance

ModifyInstanceParam.document: This API (ModifyInstanceParam) is used to modify instance parameters.
ModifyInstanceParam.name: Modifies instance parameters

ModifyInstancePasswordComplexity.document: This API is used to modify the password complexity of a TencentDB instance.
ModifyInstancePasswordComplexity.name: Modifies the password complexity of a TencentDB instance

ModifyInstanceTag.document: This API (ModifyInstanceTag) is used to add, modify, or delete an instance tag.
ModifyInstanceTag.name: Modifies an instance tag

ModifyLocalBinlogConfig.document: This API is used to modify the retention policy of local binlog of an instance.
ModifyLocalBinlogConfig.name: Modifies the retention policy of local binlog

ModifyNameOrDescByDpId.document: This API is used to modify the name or description of a placement group.
ModifyNameOrDescByDpId.name: Modifies the name or description of a placement group

ModifyParamTemplate.document: This API is used to modify a parameter template. The common request parameter `Region` can only be set to `ap-guangzhou`.
ModifyParamTemplate.name: Modifies a parameter template

ModifyRemoteBackupConfig.document: This API is used to modify the configuration information of a remote TencentDB instance backup.
ModifyRemoteBackupConfig.name: Modifies the configuration information of a remote TencentDB instance backup

ModifyRoGroupInfo.document: This API is used to update the information of a TencentDB RO group, such as configuring a read-only instance removal policy in case of excessive delay, setting read weights of read-only instances, and setting the replication delay.
ModifyRoGroupInfo.name: Updates RO instance group

ModifyTimeWindow.document: This API (ModifyTimeWindow) is used to update the maintenance time window of a TencentDB instance.
ModifyTimeWindow.name: Updates a maintenance time window

OfflineIsolatedInstances.document:
This API (OfflineIsolatedInstances) is used to deactivate isolated TencentDB instances immediately. The instances must be in isolated status, i.e., their `Status` value is 5 in the return of the [instance list querying API](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/236/15872?from_cn_redirect=1).

This is an asynchronous API. There may be a delay in repossessing some resources. You can query the details by using the [instance list querying API](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/236/15872?from_cn_redirect=1) and specifying the InstanceId and the `Status` value as [5, 6, 7]. If the returned instance is empty, then all its resources have been released.

Note that once an instance is deactivated, its resources and data will not be recoverable. Please do so with caution.
OfflineIsolatedInstances.name: Deactivates isolated TencentDB instances

OpenAuditService.document: This API is used to enable the audit service.
OpenAuditService.name: Enables the audit service

OpenDBInstanceEncryption.document:
This API is used to enable the encryption feature for instance data storage, and custom keys are supported.

Note: Before enabling data storage encryption for an instance, you need to perform the following operations:

1. [Initialize an instance](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/236/15873?from_cn_redirect=1).

2. Enable [KMS service](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/kms2)

3. [Grant permission to access KMS](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/cam/role) for TencentDB for MySQL. The role name is `MySQL_QCSRole`, and the preset policy name is `QcloudAccessForMySQLRole`.

This API calling may take up to 10 seconds, causing the client to time out. If it returns `InternalError`, call `DescribeDBInstanceInfo` to confirm whether the backend encryption is enabled successfully.
OpenDBInstanceEncryption.name: Enables data storage encryption

OpenDBInstanceGTID.document: This API (OpenDBInstanceGTID) is used to enable GTID for a TencentDB instance. Only instances on or above version 5.6 are supported.
OpenDBInstanceGTID.name: Enables GTID for an instance

OpenWanService.document:
This API (OpenWanService) is used to enable public network access for an instance.

Note that before enabling public network access, you need to first [initialize the instance](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/236/15873?from_cn_redirect=1).
OpenWanService.name: Enables public network access for an instance

ReleaseIsolatedDBInstances.document: This API is used to deisolate an isolated TencentDB instance.
ReleaseIsolatedDBInstances.name: Deisolates TencentDB instance

ReloadBalanceProxyNode.document: This API is used to rebalance the load on database proxy.
ReloadBalanceProxyNode.name: Rebalances the load on database proxy

RenewDBInstance.document: This API is used to renew a monthly subscribed TencentDB instance, and a pay-as-you-go instance can be renewed as a monthly subscribed one by this API.
RenewDBInstance.name: Renews a TencentDB instance

ResetRootAccount.document: This API is used to reset the root account and initialize the account permissions.
ResetRootAccount.name: Resets the root account

RestartDBInstances.document:
This API (RestartDBInstances) is used to restart TencentDB instances.

Note:
1. This API only supports restarting primary instances.
2. The instance status must be normal, and no other async tasks are in progress.
RestartDBInstances.name: Restarts instances

StartBatchRollback.document: This API (StartBatchRollback) is used to roll back the tables of a TencentDB instance in batches.
StartBatchRollback.name: Rolls back database tables

StartReplication.document: This API is used to start the data replication from the source instance to the read-only instance.
StartReplication.name: Starts replication

StopDBImportJob.document: This API (StopDBImportJob) is used to stop a data import task.
StopDBImportJob.name: Stops a data import task

StopReplication.document: This API is used to stop the data replication from the source instance to the read-only instance.
StopReplication.name: Stops replication

StopRollback.document: This API is used to cancel a rollback task in progress, and returns an async task ID. You can use the `DescribeAsyncRequestInfo` API to query the result of cancellation.
StopRollback.name: Cancels a rollback task

SwitchCDBProxy.document: This API is used to switch database proxy after the proxy configuration is modified or the proxy version is upgraded.
SwitchCDBProxy.name: Switches database proxy

SwitchDBInstanceMasterSlave.document: This API is used for source-to-replica switch.
SwitchDBInstanceMasterSlave.name: Performs source-to-replica switch

SwitchDrInstanceToMaster.document: This API is used to promote a disaster recovery instance to source instance. The request parameter `Region` must be the region of the disaster recovery instance.
SwitchDrInstanceToMaster.name: Promotes a disaster recovery instance to source instance

SwitchForUpgrade.document: This API (SwitchForUpgrade) is used to switch to a new instance. You can initiate this process when the primary instance being upgraded is pending switch.
SwitchForUpgrade.name: Switches to a new instance

UpgradeCDBProxyVersion.document: This API is used to upgrade the version of database proxy.
UpgradeCDBProxyVersion.name: Upgrades the version of database proxy

UpgradeDBInstance.document: This API is used to upgrade or downgrade a TencentDB instance, which can be a primary instance, disaster recovery instance, or read-only instance.
UpgradeDBInstance.name: Modifies the configurations of TencentDB instance

UpgradeDBInstanceEngineVersion.document: This API (UpgradeDBInstanceEngineVersion) is used to upgrade the version of a TencentDB instance, which can be a primary instance, disaster recovery instance, or read-only instance.
UpgradeDBInstanceEngineVersion.name: Upgrades the version of an instance

members.document: New account name
members.name: User

Information of the table to be backed up. If this parameter is not set, the entire instance will be backed up by default. It can be set only in logical backup (i.e., BackupMethod = logical). The specified table must exist; otherwise, backup may fail.
For example, if you want to backup tb1 and tb2 in db1 and the entire db2, you should set the parameter as [{"Db": "db1", "Table": "tb1"}, {"Db": "db1", "Table": "tb2"}, {"Db": "db2"} ].

members.document:
Filter condition, which is not supported for `SQL`. The search conditions are supported as follows:

`Equal to`, `Not equal to`, `Include`, and `Exclude` can be used to search for 
`host` (Client IP),
`user` (Username),
and `DBName` (Database name).

`Equal to` and `Not equal to` can be used to search for 
`sqlType`- SQL u200dtype,
`errCode` - Error code,
`threadId`- Thread ID.

Range search is supported for the fields, such as 
`execTime`- Execution time (μs),
`lockWaitTime`u200d - Lock wait time (μs),
`ioWaitTime` - IO wait time (μs),
`trxLivingTime` - Transaction duration (μs),
`cpuTime` - CPU time (μs),
`checkRows` - Number of scanned rows,
`affectRows` - Number of affected rows,
`sentRows` - Number of returned rows.
members.name: Type

members.document:
Filter, including:
`INC` - Include,
`EXC` -Exclude,

members.document: Switch for periodic archive. Valid values: `off` (disable), `on` (enable). Default value:`off`. When you enable the periodic archive policy for the first time, you need to enter the `BackupPeriodSaveDays`, `BackupPeriodSaveInterval`, `BackupPeriodSaveCount`, and `StartBackupPeriodSaveDate` parameters; otherwise, the policy will not take effect.
members.name: EnableBackupPeriodSave

members.document: Rollback policy. Valid values: `table` (ultrafast mode), `db` (faster mode), and `full` (fast mode). Default value: `full`. In the ultrafast mode, only backups and binlogs of the tables specified by the `Tables` parameter are imported; if `Tables` does not include all of the tables involved in cross-table operations, the rollback may fail; and the `Database` parameter must be left empty. In the faster mode, only backups and binlogs of the databases specified by the `Databases` parameter are imported, and if `Databases` does not include all of the databases involved in cross-database operations, the rollback may fail. In the fast mode, backups and binlogs of the entire instance will be imported in a speed slower than the other modes.

You can use the [instance list querying API](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/236/15872?from_cn_redirect=1) to query the ID, whose value is the `InstanceId` value in output parameters.
members.name: InstanceId

members.name: EngineVersion

members.document: Switch mode for accessing the new instance.  Valid values:  `0` (switch immediately), `1` (switch within a time window). Default value: `0`. If the value is `1`, the switch process will be performed within a time window. Or, you can call the [SwitchForUpgrade](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/236/15864?from_cn_redirect=1) API to trigger the process.
members.name: WaitSwitch

members.document: Whether to upgrade kernel minor version. Valid values: 1 (upgrade kernel minor version), 0 (upgrade database engine).
members.name: UpgradeSubversion

members.document: Delay threshold. Value range: 1-10
members.name: MaxDelayTime

members.name: RequestId

members.document: Instance ID in the format of `cdb-c1nl9rpv` or `cdbro-c1nl9rpv`. It is the same as the instance ID displayed on the TencentDB Console page. You can use the [DescribeDBInstances](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/236/15872?from_cn_redirect=1) API to query the ID, whose value is the `InstanceId` value in output parameters.
members.name: InstanceId

members.document: Memory size in MB after upgrade. To ensure that the `Memory` value to be passed in is valid, please use the [DescribeDBZoneConfig](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/236/17229?from_cn_redirect=1) API to query the specifications of the memory that can be upgraded to.
members.name: Memory

members.document: Disk size in GB after upgrade. To ensure that the `Volume` value to be passed in is valid, please use the [DescribeDBZoneConfig](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/236/17229?from_cn_redirect=1) API to query the specifications of the disk that can be upgraded to.
members.name: Volume

members.document: Data replication mode. Valid values: 0 (async), 1 (semi-sync), 2 (strong sync). This parameter can be specified when upgrading primary instances and is meaningless for read-only or disaster recovery instances.
members.name: ProtectMode

members.document: Deployment mode. Valid values: 0 (single-AZ), 1 (multi-AZ). Default value: 0. This parameter can be specified when upgrading primary instances and is meaningless for read-only or disaster recovery instances.
members.name: DeployMode

members.document: AZ information of secondary database 1, which is the `Zone` value of the instance by default. This parameter can be specified when upgrading primary instances in multi-AZ mode and is meaningless for read-only or disaster recovery instances. You can use the [DescribeDBZoneConfig](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/236/17229?from_cn_redirect=1) API to query the supported AZs.
members.name: SlaveZone

members.document: Version of primary instance database engine. Valid values: 5.5, 5.6, 5.7.
members.name: EngineVersion

members.document: Switch mode for accessing the new instance.  Valid values:  `0` (switch immediately), `1` (switch within a time window). Default value: `0`. If the value is `1`, the switch process will be performed within a time window. Or, you can call the [SwitchForUpgrade](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/236/15864?from_cn_redirect=1) API to trigger the process.
members.name: WaitSwitch

members.document: AZ information of secondary database 2, which is empty by default. This parameter can be specified when upgrading primary instances and is meaningless for read-only or disaster recovery instances.
members.name: BackupZone

members.document: Instance type. Valid values: master (primary instance), dr (disaster recovery instance), ro (read-only instance). Default value: master.
members.name: InstanceRole

members.document: The resource isolation type after the instance is upgraded. Valid values: `UNIVERSAL` (general instance), `EXCLUSIVE` (dedicated instance), `BASIC` (basic instance). If this parameter is left empty, the resource isolation type will be the same as the original one.
members.name: DeviceType

members.document: The number of CPU cores after the instance is upgraded. If this parameter is left empty, the minimum value will be automatically filled based on the value specified by `Memory`.
members.name: Cpu

members.document: QuickChange options. Valid values: `0` (common upgrade), `1` (QuickChange), `2` (QuickChange first). After QuickChange is enabled, the required resources will be checked. QuickChange will be performed only when the required resources support the feature; otherwise, an error message will be returned.
members.name: FastUpgrade

members.document: Delay threshold. Value range: 1-10. Default value: `10`.
members.name: MaxDelayTime

members.document: Whether to migrate the source node across AZs. Valid values: `0` (no), `1`(yes). Default value: `0`. If it is `1`, you can modify the source node AZ.
members.name: CrossCluster

members.document: New AZ of the source node. This field is only valid when `CrossCluster` is `1`. Only migration across AZs in the same region is supported.
members.name: ZoneId

members.document: Processing logic of the intra-AZ read-only instance for cross-cluster migration. Valid values: `together` (intra-AZ read-only instances will be migrated to the target AZ with the source instance by default.), `severally` (intra-AZ read-only instances will maintain the original deployment mode and will not be migrated to the target AZ.).
